Title: Eye tracking with Kinect for Windows
Description: Attempts to track eyes and calculate the pupillary distance of the user using Kinect for Windows.
HomeWiki:
Eye Tracking with Kinect for Windows

This application attempts to track eyes and calculate your pupillary distance.
Unfortunately, Kinect is not capable of tracking eyes accurately, so the pupillary distance will be slightly off.

Please feel free to improve, modify, copy and use. 

Before you run it:

Make sure you copy FaceTrackData.dll and FaceTrackLib.dll to the same folder as the executables.
The dlls are included in Kinect SDK and x86 versions should be used.

Requirements:

Kinect for Windows
Kinect SDK and Kinect Tookit
